metadata.description: EXACT coordinates extracted from static T661 PDF using PDF analysis
metadata.extraction_method: PyPDF2 text+rectangle extraction with smart association

line_242_uncertainties.title: Scientific or technological uncertainties
line_242_uncertainties.full_label: What scientific or technological uncertainties did you attempt to overcome? (Maximum 350 words)

line_244_work_performed.title: Work performed
line_244_work_performed.full_label: What work did you perform in the tax year to overcome the scientific or technological uncertainties described in line 242? (Summarize the systematic investigation or search) (Maximum 700 words)

line_246_advancements.title: Scientific or technological advancements
line_246_advancements.full_label: What scientific or technological advancements did you achieve or attempt to achieve as a result of the work described in line 244? (Maximum 350 words)

usage_notes.coordinate_system: PDF points (72 DPI), origin at bottom-left
usage_notes.page_indexing: Page 1 in mapping = Page 2 of form (0-indexed in pdf-lib)
usage_notes.text_wrapping: Use 9pt font, 12pt line height, wrap at 570pts width
usage_notes.word_limits: Enforce max_words during LLM generation to prevent overflow
usage_notes.extraction_source: Coordinates extracted programmatically from static PDF, verified accurate
